trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control
trans-unit.target: Este evento se desencadena cuando se cambia el valor de una de las siguientes propiedades de columna de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el control de eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
